Are you open are you closed or do you just pay people to stand around and smoke and tell customers you re closed  Food wise  when you re open or your employees want to work  it s ok  never much care for how it s put together  but I ve always liked JITB  that is until this location. Sad to have such a great location and be losing  so much late night business

Not sure why I come to this place.  Maybe because it s by my house and I hope one day they re get their stuff together.  List of things they ve been out of   rice  chicken  egg rolls  root beer  Dr Pepper and there s a few I ve probably forgotten.  I m not sure how they stay in business when they re randomly out of things ALL the time.  Oh and one night they just  didn t have a cook  so there s that..
Poor service  poor attitude  slow service all around bad time. I get its fast food bit so is chick filet and you would never get service like this there...

Carlos the cook sucks....he is a pretend to be manager supervisor who wanted to show off in front of his female co-workers by refusing to take our coupons. He lied and said we can only use 1 coupon per car  when the coupon says we can use 1 coupon per person per visit  through our coupon back at us and told us to leave. The coupon worked in bringing us to this location but the poor attitude will sure cost you all more business.

PUBIC HAIR IN MY BURGER. Visited this location on 10 26 17 at 9 54 pm. I found a giant pubic hair cooked into the patty of my burger. I will never again visit any Jack In The Box. Absolutely disgusting  absolutely unacceptable. Accidents happen but I am not letting this one slide.
Nice new remodel. I like this location the best. Better food quality taste and location is great

So  I went through the drive thru and order my stuff. Got to the window and gave this person who did not seem to know what they were doing my credit card. They told me it declined which I knew was impossible  so I asked them to run it again. About two seconds later she handed it back to me and said it declined again even though I knew she did not really try to run it as the card was good. Told her to forget it. Went across the street to McDonalds. Got basically the same thing  but less expensive and low and behold my credit card worked just fine. A couple of days later the charge that would not supposedly go through at Jack in The Box showed up on my billing statement. Contacted their local office via email and they assured me that they would give me a refund. They also sent me a coupon for a free meal that expired two days after I received it. They never gave me a refund and I ended up having to charge my card back to get a refund. Bad customer service at every level

We don t normally frequent chain restaurants  but this one  amp  one other are exceptions to that rule. We love the food  pure  amp  simple.   This location is pretty typical. Average customer service  average environment. But put that together with tasty food  a convenient location  and a great price... and you re left with a decent place to bring a large family to eat that won t break the bank.

I been there all my life  and worked there for a little while . Kelly is an amazing person i live him   he s always so amazing and so nice . Recently i just had a really bad experience  these new girls especially  Sandra  is so rude and disrespectful. I was being nice because I thought she was new and I been there before but she threw me the order and btw I ordered a float  it was just soda and whipped cream . Sandra was really rude   I tried calling and no answer . That really is upsetting.

Customer service isn t that great here  but I come ever so often because this is the closest place to me. What drew the last straw for me is that I walked in to place an order and asked if I can get a shake for a drink  the cashier shook her head and said no. Okay  that was fine  but someone came through drive thru and asked for a shake and she said  Let me check the machine real quick.  it worked and she said she could accommodate the shake. I witnessed all this and I proceeded to ask    Am I able to order a shake then   She told me no  she s only able to make one.  I asked her how she was able to sell it to drive thru  and she said there was only enough mix to make one and she could prove it to me. That was besides the point  I asked her how was she able to check the machine for drive thru  but yet she couldn t check it for me...    Note....she was a manager on shift and didn t care or felt bad for what she just did. HORRIBLE      Good example you are setting for your team..
I get sick EVERY time I have eaten here. Hadn t been in a while and gave it a chance due to the late hour. Same result. AVOID

Hi  I just left Jack on Burnet Rd. And Anderson Ln.  I ordered 2 sour dough Jacks and one sauced carne asada with Curley fries and was charged 30 cents extra for the Curley fries  but when I got home it had reg. Fries   I guess next Time I will open my food containers before I leave Jack.  The food is still good   Carry out number 498

This place is terrible. We were excited to cheat a little on our diet and have some fast food. Total waste of a cheat meal. Sourdough jack tasted off. My wife s Spicy Chicken sandwich was not good. Even the tacos and egg rolls tasted weird. The. Their fountain drink was broken and they could not give us our sodas and would not refund our money for the drinks because  a manager was not there to approve it . We won t be going back.
Dear Jack in the Box   You suck. My tummy is not happy with you at ALL. Learn to cook your food properly. Die now.  Thanks bunches   D.

This Jack-in-the-Box holds a special place in my heart.  The employees are friendly.  Like all Jack-in-the-Box locations  they are cheap and often have specials displayed in posters hung on their windows.  I ve never gotten sick eating here before.  It has a 24-hour drive-through window but the indoor-dining closes at midnight.  They have free refills  too  since the drink fountain is located next to the ordering counter .  This Jack-in-the-Box location is spotlessly clean  fast  and conveniently-located.  They have a driveway off Burnet Rd and another off Anderson Ln.  They are located on the Northeast corner of Burnet Rd   Anderson Ln.  For a fast food place  it definitely deserves five stars.

Sense a theme here on the service   I ve never had a problem with the staff not speaking English.  Now  I ve had the staff on their cellphones  both in the drive thru and the dining room.  And I ve had orders butchered on numerous occasions  even though I never ask for anything out of the ordinary.    But damnit the ultimate cheeseburger is awesome.  Just take the extra time to open your bag and make sure it s what it s supposed to be.  The jerks behind you in the drive thru can deal with it  and heck they ll probably do the same thing.

Accurate order-taking with correctly filled orders as well as the new seasoned burgers make for a four-star fast food dining experience.  It s not Uchi or Sullivan s  but it s good for.... fast food.  Besides  I have an addiction to Jack in the Box tacos and that awesome Freestyle drink machine.

every visit... every employee...everytime is slow  wrong and a ridiculous experience.  I know I know..it is at a busy intersection Burnet and Anderson..there  might be slim pickins for hirees at such a busy location.  Hells bells can English be the drive-thru persons..say 2 nd language  Ah well  when in the mood for  quick meal  and quicker digestion of that meal..you will for sure get one out of 2 here....grnted it will be the latter of them but..  ok as you were.

Jack in the Box...  How does one properly review a jack in the box  does one review it on its merits of food quality  or does one review it on its merits of service  or speed  or even just against other jack in the boxes one has been to..   I think I have been to a faster JitB  and I think I have been to an easier to get in and out of JitB.   This is the closest JitB I have ever lived near  and it also is the most recently remodeled JitB I have been too. It is very clean now after the remodel  but before  going in was bad.   It has the JitB odor  that others who live near JitB s will understand. Just before and during certain rush hours  the steam and smoke that billows out of the top smells like rancid YUK. That is unless you have had a few to drink  then it just drives you mad that you can not walk up to the drive through window.

Im a stranger to this part of town and was here on errands  and needed some breakfast for my kids because we were out earlier than usual. This place seems like an unseeming location  but the service was AMAZING. I didn t realize there were breakfast kids meals  So I began ordering little things separately like I usually do  and the lady realized I must be ordering for kids and recommended the kids meals. Saved me money  I ve never noticed it on a menu. Everyone at the register was all smiles and very friendly  And the food was fresh too. It was a pleasant way to begin my day  Thanks for the great service. When I m back in the area  I ll return
This location has really gotten its act together. Every time I visited in the last few months I m greeted with friendly service and  the correct food.  Yeah- maybe someone reads Yelp

Again  I stopped by and ordered a  Supreme Croissant  waited for near to 5 minutes. When I got back to the office it was a  Sausage Croissant  I was not going to waste my gas going back but I was very disappointed with the staff for making this error. Maria took the order  I do not know who made the sandwich. I don t go often because it is so far from my office so it is a treat that was a letdown.  Just thought you should know

The Event   I was getting thirsty and a little hungry and saw the Jack in the Box on the corner.  I zipped in and ordered two cheeseburgers with special sauce instead of mustard and ketchup and a drink from the drive thru window.   I then drove around the back and parked to eat my goods.  You may think that was an event in itself but it wasn t the event.  As I was eating a small pickup truck pulled up in an open space just in front and to the side of the Batmobile and I noticed that a young couple was inside. The pickup was one that was modified so the cab was about three feet higher than the tires which made the pickup about four to five feet from the ground.  The passenger side of the pickup door opened and a really cute sexy Asian girl slid across the seat and jumped to the ground.  At that instant her sun dress caught on something in the seat and when her feet hit the ground her dress was up to her neck and almost over her head. Whoops there it is     Not a stitch of underwear top or below  DOH .  Well I am guessing my face was now three shades of red and my tongue was hanging out of my mouth and heading down my chin.  For what seemed like minutes but I am guessing less than five seconds she regained herself and pulled the dress loose and back in place.  She then noticed me and looked at me right in the eyes and smiled and politely walked around the pickup and took her guys hand and headed into the Jack in the Box.  Now I will have this image  The Event   in my mind for years to come.  I am guessing I was at the right place at the right time or was it the wrong place at the wrong time.  Only the reader can decide.  Anyway I finished by cheeseburgers and drink and drove away.  I like the cheeseburgers and have eating them many times over the years but only with the special sauce. I know this was a onetime event but I can always hope for a repeat.    Would I go back  Yes every now and then I crave a cheeseburger with the special sauce.  BTW  Did I mention I like the special sauce

Honestly I m really sympathetic to fast food workers  but after finding hair in my food TWICE  the second time two hairs  I just stopped eating here. I haven t been able to eat at Jack in the Box since.

I think this is the right location i went to. The service was excellent and the employee was very nice.  I ordered the 2 tacos and a medium fries and drink the drink was great the fries were fare little cold but maybe that was because i got it togo but the tacos were not good. I had better tacos at other restaurants
Takes way too long to get your food here if you dine in. After the food  ordered 4 milkshakes and took 10 minutes for them to even get started on them. Eat somewhere else. Not worth coming here.

Am I really giving Jack in the Box 4 stars    Heck ya.  It is kind of scary that the staff has always been super friendly and smiles at you.  Hey Olivia staff  take note  My food is always hot and well delicious.  I love their cheeseburger...cheese is always melted perfectly and good meat to bread ratio and curly fries. Oh the curly fries.  I know it is not someplace to frequent  but I really relish in my precious time with Jack.

Early morning late nights on the weekend they routinely have only 1 person working. Last weekend from time I ordered to the time I got my good was 23 mins. These are very busy times and more than 1 person is necessary. Also  their window decals state that their entire menu is available all day  but they refuse to serve anything their late night meals during the day. Get your advertising right

I had four Street tacos here while I was at Independence brewing. They were absolutely delicious and Margie was very sweet. The chicken and beef fajita meat was very lean and no gristle or fat and everything was well cooked and delicious. My wife got the nachos which was a really big serving and I had some of those which were also great. I will definitely be back here for the beer and for the tacos
The best crispy beef tacos I ve eaten in Texas  Try it   The nachos are also delicious
Awesome taco food truck at Independence Brewing Company.  I ordered the crispy chicken tacos and my wife had the al pastor street tacos.  Both styles were excellent
Best Tacos in Austin  My favorite is the Pork Tacos with the red sauce

Legit fresh and delicious Mexican food. I ve tried their mini tacos and Sopes and the Gorditas. This place is truly exceptional and the people that run the truck are so friendly. I love that they give a packet of sour cream with each order and their salsa s are on point   Give them a try  you will not be disappointed

A fabulous place to enjoy healthy Mexican food. I decided to take a chance and order a few things off Uber Eats for dinner tonight. The food arrived hot because they wrapped it in foil  so that was a huge plus. The flavor was excellent. Very fresh  healthy  and low salt   oil. You can tell that this is quality food made by people who care. I really hope their standards never change no matter how busy they may get. Thanks for becoming my new favorite mexican place.
Pricey but worth it. The tacos are huge. The dont skimp that s for sure. Very sad they moved.

Went here after me and my wife decided to try tacos while we were on vacation. The guy making the tacos didn t wear gloves or anything while making the food which I didn t like. The chicken tacos was stuffed pretty good with chicken but lacked seasoning and toppings. My wife had the pulled pork tacos and they were okay. For the price I would ve expected more

This place has fantastic tacos  The flavor is very authentic and reminds me of tacos I ve had in costal towns south of the border. The owner was really pleasant and they have a few nice tables to sit at outside. I will definitely be trying them again
This place has the some of the best tacos ive ever had. The contents are seasoned and flavorful and they offer tacos you can t get anywhere else. great customer service and food always
Tacos here are amazing   Steak  Shrimp  Fish  Chicken pretty much everything   My whole family loves this place

Ok so I been in Austin for About two years on this side of town I would have to travel to Rosita Al Pastor bomb tacos I can finally say the Tacos here were amazing the bang bang shrimp Tacos and the Texas taco I also had a salmon taco all 3 get a 5 star from. This shit was real good and also great customer service. I met the owners one day in HEB they invited me to try took me A while glad I did this is great and definitely will be back and by the way the taco are huge.

Why only one star.  Never had the opportunity to taste their food.  Tried to order through delivery  through their offering of Grub Hub .  Second attempt At 5 00 PM they actually gave me updates    My order is being prepared  then  It is on it s way  - 2hours later  I was starving  and they said they would refund my money because the restaurant had closed .  By the way the place is just down the road form me.  Tried again today and the phone number I got was Grub Hub.  No-one spoke English and after 15 min. I give up. Oh yes  tried calling the restaurant directly and they kept asking  new order  and when I went to relate my past 3 experiences  they hung up.  By I am retired  love to cook but like to order out once a week for things I do not want to cook .  Why can I not post this without giving all my information

I did not receive one of my tacos and they are expensive.  5 for a beef or chicken and  7 for seafood. I tried calling and emailing with no response. I gave a tip before receiving my food and my order was around  32 for just 2 tacos and nachos.  I will say it is a big portion for the nachos and they were tasty. My father enjoyed the pork taco  but did not like the fish which I gave him since the 3rd taco was missing.

Really wanted to like this place... but I couldn t. There s just no flavor. At first I was shocked because the tacos range  7- 9 EACH but then I saw the size and could understand why. Pretty good size taco. But again  the flavor... there s none. I added the salsa and it s not spicy or flavorful. Customer service was 10 10. Overall  it was just good. I m a native Austinite and have had similar tacos for a quarter of the price with lots of flavor. Maybe if there was a spicer sauce or more seasoning it could be better.

Very underwhelming and expensive for bad food. 4 tacos and queso    50. Nothing was homemade. The salsa had 0 flavor and the queso was definitely just heated up from a can. I had the beef taco and the bang bang shrimp. The beef taco was the most greasy taco I ve ever had with 0 flavor. I ve never see so much shredded cheese just dumped on top. The taco shell was chewy and not crunchy. The bang bang shrimp. What a nightmare. The shell was a tempura shell  It was so massive you couldn t even eat it. They serve it with a fork. 3 ok tasting shrimp with a flavorless slaw on the bottom. They have a  bar  attached that you can t go into. It s just there to house the beer for when patrons order. Definitely would not recommend and won t be going back.

The food here was absolutely delicious. The seating area and overall setup was nice too. We ordered from the food truck and sat outside on the bar s patio and enjoyed the breeze while we feasted on the Adobe Chicken and Baja Shrimp tacos as well as their homemade salsa with chips. The chicken was street style on double corn tortillas. It was juicy  marinated shredded chicken that had a bit of a kick...which I LOVE. The Baja Shrimp was in the puffy taco shell. My husband really loved them. The salsa was good  but could have used a little salt.  That s our preference which is easy enough to add. Others may think it s perfect as is.  They have several choices for drinks at the truck like canned sodas  bottled water  Topo Chico  Corona Beer and White Claws. If you wanted a margarita or other specialty drink you could find them at the bar. I would definitely go here again. There were plenty of seating options  fans  fun outdoor lighting  speakers for music and other food truck options. I definitely see us making this a local hangout.

Not sure why the reviews are so low. I mean it is a Chipotle  so you shouldn t be expecting high end cuisine. I got a bowl and I thought it was on par with other Chipotles I ve been to. Pretty good quality.

I paid cash and the cashier acted as if she didn t have to give me my change back. Like this was normal. Then when I asked about the change she owed me she said that they didn t have change to give me. This is the second time this has happened at this location. Not sure where chipotle gets off taking my lunch money but that register needs to be stocked if the store is open.

This Chipotle is walking distance from my house and I ve come here over 100 times. It was good for a while but then got a new manager and it has been downhill ever since.  Now it feels like they are constantly bringing in new people to try to get this location firing on all cylinders but it s just gotten worse.   I have gotten to the point where I know my order will be wrong or laughable portions based on who is there.   Check out the photo below of my  salad . Look at these portion sizes . I think I counted 9 total pieces of lettuce.

Terrible burrito. Like  the worst. Every ingredient tasted gross and I ended up throwing away a  40  after delivery tip and taxes  meal. Proportions were wrong and the ingredients tasted... off. Just gross.  Now I m mad at myself for ordering it. Never again.

Ok so just to let it be known  this was the absolute last straw with this chipotle on 5th. Mind you  I live in the building so I gave them more than enough chances to redeem themselves  ofc to only be let down again. To start off I asked for double tortilla shell  for extra coverage due to me requesting double meat  the employee proceeded to wrap it normal without spreading them out  all the while  my burrito is crying for help due to being double meat  yet the employee proceeded to wrap the burrito as it burst out completely from the shell. Attitude out of This world  you d think someone getting ready to get off would be extremely chipper  complete opposite. This chipotle continues to piss me off time after time  the saddest part is I still choose to give you my money  pathetic of me ofc.
Taste good to me. I don t know what the fuck everyone else is bitching about. Lol Carnitas
Hands down the best Chipotle in Austin. Always excellent service  amp  fresh ingredients. Keept up the good work guys.

I go to Chipotle regularly and this is the branch closest to me. Finding street parking nearby is kind of a pain. I haven t experienced problems with small portion sizes like some of the other Yelpers. Guac is always fresh  which is a big plus for me.

Do not order online to this location. The smallest portion I have ever seen for Chipolte   This is the first time I have used the online app and it was super convenient however  I was less than impressed with my order.  Very small portion and the guac did not look fresh.

Simple  clean and wholly satisfying Mexican food.  I really enjoyed my dinner the two times I visited this place while in Austin for the week.  It s in a really nice  and newer development  area in the neighborhood. The burrito portions are HUGE and the ingredients fresh.  I enjoyed the Carnitas Burrito both times there.    It seems popular with the locals as I observed while dining in both nights.   The staff was friendly and they worked hard to keep the place clean when not taking care of customers.    However  I will suggest the self-serve drink station be cleaned up a little more frequently.  Other than that  I d be happy to recommend this restaurant.

This is the best chipotle in Austin. Ignore the other reviews. Ive ordered more chipotle than anyone who has ever left a review on Yelp and I can tell you for a fact they have the freshest ingredients  best customer service  and correct portion sizes.  The chipotle on 6th Congress and the one by UT will give you a soggy wimpy burrito. But East 5th knows how to roll a burrito   Shame they stopped doing mobile orders though

Live in the Saltillo apartment building above  have eaten here 20 plus times. New manager  has helped a bit but is still understaffed and sloppy.   The lack of customer service with greeting  slowness in getting food ready  and overall disarray that is apparent makes this chipotle specifically a pain to deal with.   Corporate should send one of their regional managers here for 3 months to train the staff correctly. This place should be packed and it s not because it s slow and unorganized.

This location is poorly managed. Employees need better training. They are super slow  don t greet you  running all over the restaurant and not at an assigned station like other chipotles. Food station didn t look clean. Will go out of my way to another chipotle location rather than this one unless there s improvement.

Love the food and how easy it is to order online. I m writing this review to hopefully change how little chips they give you. Here s a photo of my chip bag. This happens every time. It drives me crazy. It s like they expect you to have more chips at home for the queso

Some of the worst customer experience I ve encountered. We waited to be helped for at least 5 minutes while no body else was in line. Cashier had an attitude and was so rude. One of our bowls was half empty and on top of that we found a HUGE CLUMP OF HAIR in it. 0 10 experience  we will not be coming back.

Just opened  Always an easy  go-to fast food choice for me. Relatively healthy with wholesome ingredients. I always opt for double everything  cilantro lime rice  black beans  mild salsa Pico de gallo  fajita veggies and  corn. I normally go for their chipotle marinated chicken. It s tender  juicy and packed with a smoky flavor    To avoid long lunch lines  order by phone  online  or though the app  Walk straight up to the register when it s ready.
Same great high quality food. Quick service. They added cauliflower rice which is a must try.

As a step above fast food chain restaurant you would think that the experience level would be fairly similar across the board... wrong. This location is new and probably the  nicest  one near downtown Austin so why is the service absolute garbage every time I come here  The cleaning and food preparation standards are wildly low and the staff is blatantly rude and overall unprofessional. When I requested that the food preparer changed his gloves after he was cleaning the counter with a soppy  wet  rag and changing out the trash he pulled off his mask and started talking about me to his co-workers saying i m find bro i m so done. It was really off putting and made me feel so uncomfortable. After his co-workers and him started making fun of my order under their breath I had to pull a Karen and just leave. i have stopped ordering here off uber eats because the order is almost never correct and always sloppy and or sparse. I would urge the management here to better train their staff on customer etiquette as well as heath code compliance. Sad to say but after a number of bad experiences I will no longer be eating at this establishment.

Went to pickup my food after ordering and paying online. I had a promise time of  7 30pm  and my order wasn t ready until 8 05pm. A full hour after it was placed. Very few people were in line during this time. Not enough to be over 30 minutes late while still actively serving people at the counter.

We go out of our way to use this location rather than the one that is closer to us because they are generally pretty timely and nice. Would recommend    I usually get the veggie bowl  which includes guac  and they sometimes forget the guac  which is super annoying to discover when you get home     but are otherwise fairly reliable with online orders.

Honestly this location is awful. Some of the employees seem to have a chip on their shoulder. One of the female employees in the front puts the bare minimum of food in your bowl  and when you ask for more she has an annoyed look and body language. If I m paying  2 extra for cauliflower rice I expect a full spoon full of it. I recently walked into the location 03 25 21 for lunch and there s was only 1 person in front of me who also walked in at the same time. There was 1 girl in the front making something  and another girl in the back who started walking toward the register rolling her eyes and throwing her head back. Then they both went to the back of the store leaving me and the other customer confused and by alone waiting. I continued to hear an angry slamming of things around in the back before they finally came back out to help their customers. I work in retail and this attitude and behavior is completely unacceptable  if I acted like this where I work I would be disciplined and possibly fired for it. One of the worst things you can do in any job is treat your customers like you don t want them to be there. These ladies act like they don t want to be there and it really shows in their customer service skills  which they have ZERO of by the way. This is disappointing because I like chipotles food but unfortunately I won t be going to this location anymore. Please clean up your employees attitudes or hire new people.
Not the happiest friendliest bunch here. Also check your food before you drive off. This passed as a large fry.

Bad food     I agree with commenter Johnathan L.     Check your food before you leave or you will end up with very old food  like me   My worst experience with this place   Check out my tacos. You decide.  The drive through employee didn t seem unhappy but my food made me unhappy

Usually have a decent experience coming to this location. Not this morning. Ordered several things...cashier seemed to be in a bad mood. She took my credit card for payment and returned it with no receipt  I usually get one . The food looked like they grabbed yesterdays left overs and tried to make me a sandwich  supreme croissant . Cold cheese  crumbled bacon  greasy egg.  -   Very disappointing.  Whoever prepared this meal should not be In a kitchen. Very bad experience.
Worst Jack in the box ever. They need a new manager.  I just attempted to go through the drive-thru and was informed they have not meat.

I ve never had any luck with Jack in the Box  except for one nice milkshake  but this one failed hard in breakfast. I mean a rock hard biscuit for the sandwich.  The hash brown wasn t bad.  Also.  You can t get decaf coffee here  so I won t be back.

For many years  I occasionally would hit the drive thru at a Jack in the Box because I usually could get a chicken fajita pita that was somewhat decent for being fast food. The one I got at this location was the worst I can remember ever having. The chicken was so grey and slimy that I couldn t eat it. I m guessing it was bad luck  but now I m hesitant to take the chance at ordering another one from this William Cannon location.

This location closes whenever it wants. I made a large order on the app at 10 20p on a Saturday only to show up and they had already closed even though they processed my payment and they are listed as open late.

They re never open. Like ever. There are employees inside but they won t take your order. We ve been told they re out of food  they re experiencing technical issues or their systems are down. I live close so I have no choice when I m craving those mini tacos and they seem to drop the ball every time
I have no idea why I am even here after the last time.  Does Jack in the box corporate even care how terrible they are  Done for good

Drive thru took like 20 minutes  very simple order and they still screwed it up. By the time I realized it couldn t go back to complain  the whole place was locked up. They must have very inexperienced staff.

First time visit  drive-thru  and staff was friendly. Food was served promptly and exactly how we ordered. I was a tad disappointed with the chicken sandwich - way too bland but the next day hubby went back and we tried the burgers  which are pretty good. Doable if you re super hungry and need a quick fix.

I went to this jack in the box this Wednesday about 745pm. I found the east door not operating and would not open. I then walked to the lobby door facing empty cannon and walked into an empty lobby. I walked up to the counter and observed several people in the cooking area cooking and taking care of the drive through. I made eye contact with the female in the back but she continued cooking and ignored me. I waited about 10 minutes and left. This is the worst treatment I have ever received from a restaurant in along time. If jack in the box cannot do better than this Close Down. Sorry experience and go anywhere but this restaurant.  Bad place. I ll never be back.

Sign says the drive thru is open 24 hrs but at least 4 times they have turned off all the lights and pretended to be closed. There have literally been handwritten signs from the SAME employee saying they are closed for the night  I know from the car parked in the parking lot literally every single time  and don t respond to cars who come through the drive thru. Horrible customer service.   This is now the probably 5th time I ve come that they ve pretended to be closed... absolutely ridiculous.

Drive through person is amazingly rude and crazy   Just went through and woman was barking out at me.  She was aggressive  and this isn t the first time she s done this.  She doesn t want to add in options or allow you to change your mind.  She basically screams through the microphone.  If I was her boss  I would fire her on the spot for aggressive behavior toward customers.

Came to eat and saw a lady in the kitchen texting on her phone and than pick up cheese to finish making a hamburger. I was standing at the counter and asked the employees who the manager was and the person who was on her phone turned out to be the manager.  Look  this is gross and I will never visit this place again.
I went there at 10pm on a Saturday. It was only 5 after 10  they close at 11pm. They were not open. That is unacceptable. Sorry I get off late and wanted some garbage food.

I have come to this location a couple times in the am  i work late.. again I pulled to the drive through 230am on June 23. The lady said the card machine isn t working  this happened before here. The first time they said it didn t work and I fussed about it. They magically had it working after a couple mins. The thing is I know it s a late night shift  money is tight but claiming the card machine is broken just to have a cash exchange.... hummmmm so the owner of this spot should maybe check late shift inventory. This morning I told them I have three dollars then they said thank you and didn t even take my order when I said I would use cash.

On my recent visit to my neighborhood restaurant  I ordered double scrambled eggs  which I received  double bacon which by the way I received four slices on my previous visits. However  on this visit  I received two slices and was told by the cashier and manager that was a double order  because the slices were cut in half  It is my understanding that a double order would be four whole slices and not two slices  That s the reason for the low rating.

I have to drop the rating down to 2 stars this year as on several occasions when I would go in for a malt to take home to the Lady and freeze to eat later  works well and she likes it  and the malt machine was either not working or empty. This location is the only JITB I will eat at when I am dealing with an urgent matter and need food fast. I will say that they were a lifesaver in the past when I would come home in the middle of the night and had to have something before getting up in 2 hours to go deal with urgent matters.

Super friendly staff in the morning when I got breakfast at 6am-ish on a Thursday. Only a few cars in drive thru at that time. I ve been to this location twice. I don t eat out much at all fast food wise  but I d recommend this place. The only concern is the coffee isn t the greatest even with cream and sugar.
Hey the food is the food but the guy at the window was very concerned about customer service and was super nice so for this place definitely nice staff or whoever the guy at the window was

Not sure why the quality deteriorated so much. Spicy chicken sandwich was super dry and the bun was borderline stale. Not sure if this is store specific or across the franchise. They need to get their act together

Countless times have I been to this restaurant. Countless times they have been unable to serve me.  This is arguably this most improperly managed restaurant in ALL OF AUSTIN.  Short staffed  poor shift changes  lights are on but they re not home.  EVER    You re lucky if they act like they re open after 10pm.  They mostly don t.  Seems like whomever is on shift is clearly also on drugs.  This restaurant just plain sucks at what they do.  Corporate JitB should revoke their franchise license. It s an embarrassment to a spokesman that wears a ping pong ball for a head.  Owners should sell and get out of the service industry permanently.  DO NOT ATTEMPT TO EAT HERE unless you are a glutton for punishment.  written as im.parked in the drive thru lane getting zero help from staff

Poor customer service  night staff 4 18 need to be put on corrective action and retrained.  Drive thru was open however staff were standing in the dining area talking and messing around while cars were in line waiting to order food

The girl that took my order in the drive-thru repeatedly got my order wrong after rushing me to complete my order and the guy that brought the order to the car  who had shoulder length black or brown hair  was so rude. I said  excuse me  to ask for some dressing and he proceeded to walk away and when I said  excuse me  again he said  what  and rolled his eyes. I told him  there was no dressing in my bag for my salad  and he said  come inside I ll get it for you.  Every staff member involved in my order was unnecessarily rude and the chicken in my salad was old and cold. If I could give a negative rating I would. This was August 28th  2020 at around 9 15 pm.

I asked for a moment to confirm what we were getting as well as sides and drinks. When I started my order the employee snapped at me one second with attitude. I started ordering once she was ready and she rang up a combo 10 and I told her not the 10  2 number 13s. We finally were done and provided the balance of  22 and change.  Once we got to the window my friend asked to change the root beer to a Cherry Sprite and Sonya stated that was fine. She handed us the drinks which were 3 4ths of the way full. The Cherry Dr. Pepper was flat and we were provided a sprint. I pulled forward since there was a line behind me when my friend stated we should have checked the bag before moving. Once we checked the bag we realized we were missing the 2 tacos.  We called into the store on both her phone and my own at the number  512-899-1312. On my third call Sonia answered the phone and said come to the window at 12 52 am. I was agitated at this point and stated  No  this is a 45 min wait to be here  have someone bring them to the door  as my friend stood knocking at the door facing the employees. They just pointed to the window. At this point I walked back over to the window and called again. I physically saw Sonia go to the back and pick up the phone for my call at 12 57 am. I said Hello 2 to 3 times and she hung up and walked back to the line area near the drive through window. From here I got further impatient  called another 4 times and was ignored  as my friend was knocking and ignored.   Once we got back through the line to the window I told Sonya I wanted a refund as she tried to ask what was going on and what we needed. I asked her if she was the manager in which she responded she was. My friend ate her chicken strips and some fries  but at this point I no longer wanted the food after all of this and to just refund me the money. She stated she wouldn t then kept stating what do we need. I told her she can pull her times for the past hour  she was at 30 to 45 minutes before her orders were actually completed. I asked for the name of the general manager and when she would be in. She told me 9 am and Maria. At this point she called the other woman that was working over to translate as she kept saying no  i don t care. She told the other lady she didn t know what I wanted. I repeated to the other lady the same situation and how obviously they know there is a pendimic going on since they had face masks on so why would they think telling someone to WALK up to the window in a foot space was appropiate not to mention it had been 2 hours at this point for Jack in the Box. I wanted the name of the general manager and a contact number for corporate.   The woman that was making the food translated and Sonya stated she was corporate she is manager. She stated to the other woman in spanish. Fine if she gives back the food and both beverages she can have the money back. I repeated I can give you 1 of the orders and the drinks  but due to her nature of saying  I don t care  I needed to see her getting the cash before I started handing things to her. I handed the second woman the receipt. I had handed her the bag of food and one soda. She opened the food and started slamming it down on the window saying it wasn t all there and started pushing it back in my direction. I took the second cup and slamed it on the window and stated no  I want a refund. She grabbed  11 and change and gave it back to me. Throughout this interaction she kept telling me I don t care.   I asked for my receipt back and she told me no. Have a good day and I told her I wasn t leaving until I got my receipt. She slammed the door shut in my face and when I parked the car and told her I wasn t leaving without my receipt she started talking to the other girl about us still being there in which the other woman responded Oh my god and a few other words I couldn t hear and she came to the window. Sonya then instructed her to call the cops in which I stated that is fine. She opened the door and was being extremly condisinding at this point. She just grabbed the receipt and took pictures while she basically just held it out the window. I called her a pinche pendeja  fucking idiot  and she leaned out the window before releasing the receipt and said pinche tu madre  fuck your mom .    I tried calling the store Sunday from 2 20 pm to 2 40 pm. Got dressed and drove back to the store location as the GM was suppose to be there at 9 am. When I got there I pulled around and asked to speak with the GM. Another manager came to the window and I saw her name tag and asked if she was a manager  se said yes. I asked for the GM a second time and was advised she is not in. I told her a general breakdown of my prior night with Sonya and asked for a time the GM would be in because I am far from letting this go. I was informed that information is unable to be provided as well as Sonya is in fact NOT a manager. I tried calling once again Sunday evening and didn t get any answer.

Just came to jack in the box on my lunch break. After ordering at the window I pulled forward to wait for the rest of my order and as I was pulling forward I hear the lady that took my payment  Maria  call me a  bitch       Like what        You asked me to pull forward but then I m the bitch   So rude  P.s. Tatiana offers amazing customer service every time I go . Jack in the box hire more tatianas   The Maria s will make you loose business

Gave one star because couldn t give zero stars. Went to this location at 5 30 pm waited in the drive thru line for 15 min. When my order was being taken I informed the cashier through the drive through speaker that I could barely hear him. Then nothing no hold a min  just nothing  so for 3 min I sat listening to nothing with part  most of my order on the screen. So in the confusion and haste   because two cars drove past ME giving me dirty looks  I drove up to the window. At which time the teen cashier says oh I went to get a new headset. I stated  ok  well let me finish my order. He says  oh sorry  my co-worker erased your order and I m not allowed to take an order at the window. So can you just drive back around to place your order at the screen. Or you can come in and have your order taken.   So at this point I state   ok well now I want to see your manager because that is crazy.  He tells me oh there is no manager in duty. Only a team leader I say  ok well let me speak to her.   After a few min he says oh she s on the grill. Can t you just come in. I state for the second time   my two year old is with me i can t possibly. Now I m beyond upset I take a picture of phone numbers to call to complain one is the store number and one is the survey number which only allows you to say what you think of your order taken. I then pull into a space to go in to complain asking for a corporate number. While I stand there and they approach me as if they have never seen me I talk to a customer there and tell her my issues. She laughs and says well good luck I ve been here for a about 10 Min and no one has even taken my order yet. When all three employees approach NOT ONE employee knew of such a number. Oh and by the by NOT ONE EMPLOYEE spoke English except the teen cashier.  another customer walks in turns out he too is coming from the drive thrust while listening to my exchange he leaves and states well that explains   I ask when is a manager going to be on duty. I m told NEXT WEEK. I ask how is that possible who will be doing your deposits  or tallies  and closing and opening the main store. The teen says well the manager is on vacation. I ask ok what about store managers  shift mangers. You have non of those. He tells me no. WHAT      Two weeks later still no manager on dusty no matter the time you return to the store

Visited the drive through of this location at least 8 times in the past 6 months. There is a surly young man with long dark hair working the drive through that  putting it a nice way  wouldn t know friendly customer service from his elbow. Just last week after seeing the ads for Jumbo Jacks we decided to order three combination dinners. The first problem was they were  out of drinks  and he wouldn t honor the  5.99 combo price even though I told him we d do without the drinks. Not only did he charge me full price for the three sandwiches and separate for the three  medium  fries for a total of  29.81  he said that they were out of the regular buns and I would need to pay a surcharge of  0.80 each for sourdough or  1.00 each for premium buns  we chose the latter.   When we arrived home two of the three sandwiches looked like they d sat under heat lamps for at least an hour or so...dried cheese and meat that was nearly inedible.   I took photos with my phone but couldn t post them here.  This will be the last time that we will visit this location until they replace this employee  offer fresher food and direct employees to be fairer with their pricing and offerings.  STAY AWAY

45min wait. Only one person staffed. They take one order  go make it  then take the second order  repeat.  She was on the phone with someone joking and laughing the entire time.  Lady s name was Sonia  what..what is going on at this place

I have been a loyal customer for over 15 years  going by the drive-in on my way to work for their breakfast sandwiches.  They have recent employee turnover  but  this is the fast food business.  Today I ordered a breakfast crossiant sandwich at the drive through  gave the drive through employee cash.  The cost of the sandwich was  4.54  I gave  20.54  the employee handed me the bag and did not give me the  16.00 owed  I drove off and realized an hour later they store owed me money.  No problem right   Wrong  when I looked for the receipt in the sandwich bag there was none.  When I went back the employee said he had no record of the receipt and did not owe me  16.00.  This is a scam.  There is a good chance other patrons  drove off without receiving their change  and this employee is probably ripping off the customer and Jack in the Box. This is a sad sign of the times  when an employee steals from their employer and the customer.  I will never return to this location.  Beware  do not pay in cash

i pulled up into the drive thru at 11 15 pm to order a milkshake and there was no one inside to even take my order. i sat waiting by the window for 15 minutes waiting for someone to come back but no one did.  i just wanted a milkshake  very disappointed.

Food is good for fast food and being open 24 hours but always check your order. The accuracy here if you use the drive-thru is not good. Always check everything--taste your drink  check to make sure everything in your order is there before you drive away. They get orders right 1 5 visits.
Yeah  you re not open 24 hours if I pull up to the drive-thru at 10 35pm and no one responds and then the screen shuts off. Looked pretty empty inside the kitchen to me.

The service was terrible  The food was terrible  Not worth my time or money. The jalape os were so burnt you can t eat them  the  spicy chicken sand was NOT spicy and the chicken was chewy and hard  and out of strawberry shakes... waste of money and I d like a refund
I ordered tacos and when I got home they were drenched in oil I couldn t even it the tacos so disgusting I can t believe they serve food like this it s so lazy

The drive through at night need more people. There s one to two people every night and I ve been waiting in the line for about 10-15 min now just to get to window. It is 09 05 17 10pm and this is terrible They need to rethink how many people work at night

Just got back from going through the drive-through and I ordered the   8 which is a sriracha burger. Instead I got a spicy chicken sandwich   10. The fries were lukewarm  got no napkins or ketchup. The service was not very friendly. Do not recommend this location

Thought I d try a jack in the box burger. Sign said open til midnight  drive through open 24 hours. The doors were locked and no one was at the drive through. Why  Because they were outside leaning into a car chatting. I hope these people don t get paid much. I also hope the owner fires the night manager and crew. The owner should be embarrassed. I will never think of stopping at a jerk in the box again.

Stopped off here couple days ago in the morning on the way to work.  Wasn t impressed.  Lady in the drive thru seemed to be wanting to rush the orders.  I was one of two cars in the drive thru.   Didn t repeat my order back just said 2nd window please.  Then when I got my order.. It wasn t what I ordered.  Fast food isn t hard to get right.. I will not be returning to this location.

I almost got slapped when I asked the girl at the drive through if she could show me her Brazilian.  OK  so I didn t quite make the cut for the A-list at Estancia tonight  but I was very happy as usual to find that a little clown with the shakes did just fine as a B-plan.  Thanks  Jack

This is a real tragedy.  The food  especially breakfast  is very good  the prices right  a good ad campaign  and 24 hour drive through.  I drove 20 minutes to have breakfast here at 8 30 on a Sunday morning.  Despite signs saying the dining room opens at 5AM  all the doors were locked.  I banged on the door until someone let me in.  The people working there were nice but short-handed  working as fast as they could just to handle the drive-through  indicating bad management and ownership.  The Freestyle machine was out of Coca-Cola. It looks like someone named Rucker is the culprit.  In the last 20 minutes  7 other eager customers have given up trying to get in.  The  50 in lost revenue could have covered more staff.  It is hard for the company to succeed when they have losers as franchisees  as this impacts their well-run stores.  Customers have many other choices
Incompetent employees and food is not always fresh. I d think twice before eating here and if you go in the drive thru MAKE SURE TO CHECK YOUR FOOD before you drive off.
The food is always good but the lady that took my order in the drive thru was very short and rude and to top it off their inspection is out of date... believe it said 8 15 19 and today s the 22nd...

I know  I know  it s fast food   But I have been a fan of Jack In The Box for a long time.  On Friday  4 19 2019   we picked up some food to go for lunch and I was in the mood for a burger.  I chose the Buttery Jack Mushroom Swiss.  Big mistake.  Big  big mistake.  That patty tasted like it was made yesterday and thrown in the microwave.  Even the bread was stale.  The only reason I didn t give one star is that the fries were good.  Also  my sister ordered something completely different and we got the exact same order.  Ugh   This is probably the worst Jack in The Box I ve been to.
I love there chicken sandwich it s my go to when I stop here. It s almost as good as Chick-fil-A but it s cheaper than Chick-fil-A and open all night and Sundays so you can always get one.
I ve gone several times to order food and there was not a person who attended me to take my order is there for 10 or more minutes really I am very desepcionada  it is supposed to be open 24 hours

Curiosity doesn t always kill the cat. This time  it fed it.  I recently discovered the Deli Trio  and my taste buds have been thanking me for it ever since. Tonight the grilled sandwich tasted ten times better than usual. Provolone cheese melted and oozed from the slices of Artisan bread  drenched in creamy Italian dressing. Crunchy pickle spears protruded beneath the layers of Genoa salami  ham  and turkey  and I washed all of it down with the smooth-as-silk of Vanilla Coke.  Being open-minded has never tasted so good
Lately the taco have been cold.  Need to file a compliant but been busy.

I have to have 2 greasy tacos every once and a while  but tonight after I finished at Walgreens  I started driving next door  and suddenly all the outside lights were turned out. Drove up by the window anyway  but the place was empty.  Thought it was open 24 hours - very weird...

Wow  Holy jeebus   They sell me tacos and then after they hand them to them to me say  oh sorry no taco sauce  and then we go to get drinks and they have no ice.  Then they say  oh sorry no medium lids  and THEN leave my son standing there for five minutes to get ketchup.  Top it off with the place being FILTHY.  GROSS.    UPDATE 10 28 18  Ok let me first say that I realize that updating a review for Jack in the Box might indicate that I had a little too much time on my hands  and I ll own that up front. In the interest of fairness  I feel like I need to talk about my most recent experience a few minutes ago. All you Austin locals will feel my pain here  but recent flooding prompted a boil notice and so most restaurants are either closed or handing you lukewarm bottled water. Well the boil notice was lifted so naturally I though asking for a nice icy Dr Pepper was reasonable.  So when the little girl asked me if she could put it over ice for me  I have to admit I felt a little pampered. Then out came my breakfast croissant  lLet me also admit that I rarely eat fast food  but I was desperate today  no offense Jack-in-the-Box.  and it was cheesy sausage egg perfection.  It was so fresh steam is coming off the side of it and cheese was melted down the other side. I m telling you  it was a winner. Thanks Jack-in-the-Box.

Nothing but bad experiences at this location. Hairs in the food  rude employees  missing food  etc. Every time it s something. I never write negative reviews  but this is too common of a theme. I m done with hoping this place will improve.
I get off work really late  like one or two in the morning and this is the only place open. They always get my order right and the food is great.
As I said before I m not a fan of greasy food. My husband loves this place  why I don t know. My stomach starts hurting when were in the vicinity of this place because of the smell of dirty Grease.

Third strike   Going through drive thru   4 45-5 00AM isn t my ideal  but I expect what I pay for.  I order SWEET tea with every order  and this is the 3rd time it s not sweet enough and OLD   Tea gets old and the container should be drained of any OLD tea and then brew a new batch.  Please instruct employees  OLD TEA SUCKS
I like their Jumbo Jack  bowls and tacos. I like the grilled hamburgers and the good sauces on the tacos. I like their curly fries.

I would just like to take this opportunity to thank Jack for all the simple pleasures he has offered throughout my life.  My first fast food.   I was only a wee lass who was very excited that we were talking to a big scary clown and asking him for burgers with extra  secret sauce  from the seats of my sister s cool 67 Ford Falcon.  I shall cherish that memory.  Then came my teen-age years  where a super taco and a hot lemon turnover was pretty much the perfect munchie food for the wee hours of the night  where you really didn t know where the hell you were  but you were REALLY hungry and Jack was a familiar face with whom  you wanted to spend some time discussing a few important matters concerning the nature of the universe and perpetual motion.   Then came college and grad school  where your two tacos for .99 became life savers.  This is  apparently  what the financial aid people think you should live on  along with top ramen.  Oh Jack  thank you for those 99 cent tacos and keeping me alive.  Then came my adult years of realizing I needed to be healthy.  I realized I could still go through the drive-thru after going to the gym and get a chicken fajita pita  without cheese and a diet coke --ALL for under 250 calories    Just for old times sake  I stopped in for those 99 cent tacos the other day.  They were wonderful.  Same scary mystery meat  same weirdly appealing taco sauce  lots less cheese food.  Still tasty.   Still filling.  Still 99 cents.  Can t beat that.  postscript -- I forgot to add that I read about Jack in Fast Food Nation.  They once had an  unfortunate e coli incident .  But after that  they took extra special care and according to the book  they are one of the safest and better run fast foods around.  I knew I loved Jack.

I have been a customer for a while.  Today  I went through the drive thru and they forgot to put the tacos in my order.  I did not discover this until I was back to work and could not go back immediately and I threw the receipt in the drive thru trash.  After work  when I went in the drive thru and told them what happened  a young man s voice said  Sorry  there is nothing that I can do .  Well  if that is your policy  my policy when I am stolen from is to never go back and warn everyone else.  Now to write a weighted letter to management and be sure to  CC  all involved as well as The Better Business Bureau of Austin.  This is the first restaurant that didn t make good on their mistake. Ya ll just stole from the wrong person

No stars would be more true to my experience tonight. I got boxed in at the drive thru for 20 minutes     I m sure that guy ahead of me had fresh warm food but mine was cold in a bag when I came up behind him and the ice in my drink had melted. I even commented that how could MY food be as warm  amp  fresh as that guy ahead of me when I see it all already sitting there in a bag  I was assured it just came out.  Yea don t think so. Fries sucked and that s the indicator for me. I wish they hadn t closed the Jack on Brodie

Just went to Jack and the Box and my food was hot and its 15 til 3 am. The food is always hot too. Their drive-thru staff is always cheerful and ready to serve  best fast food service in the area on a consistent basis. Well done.

I love this place.  I remember when they built it my wife and I were so excited  because we live within walking distance.  Our favorite thing to do is to walk there for lunch whenever there is an ice storm and the city shuts down.  They ve always been open.  You get a lot of food for the money  compare JITB to the Burger Tex across the street and you ll see what I mean   and the quality is overall pretty good.  No complaints... they used to have problems a few years ago where I didn t always receive everything I ordered in the drive-through  but they seemed to have worked it out.
Always open late and the 2 tacos for 99 cents are ALWAYS consistent. Thanks Jack in the Box for my 2 am snacks. I heard there is a sweet digital soda machine inside now that I have to try.

Lately I have been reading how robots will one day take over some of human jobs. For example  fast food workers will one day be replaced by robots.  Honestly  was all for this  with the mentality   at least they ll get my order correct .  Today that feeling changed. For the first time in a LONG time  I had a wonderful experience at a fast food joint.   I am a pretty picky and particular person. I had an odd request and the lovely cashier Erica  whom never stopped smiling   went out of her way  spoke to the kitchen to make sure they understood my request before placing the order and she was so sweet about it. Mario  kitchen attended  possibly the manager  was very humorous and popped a few jokes while he was asking me to make sure he understood what I wanted. Jose  cook  made my order after Mario explained the order to him. Mario brought me my food  made sure it met my expectations.   I am a very shy person who is easily misunderstood. This experience was uplifting and put a smile on my face.   The staff is fantastic and actually care about guest satisfaction.   The personal interaction was a great feeling and I hope now that robots don t take over jobs like this. I find interacting with others important  especially one as pleasant as this one was.

Taco Bell on 1016 Anderson is not ADA complaint.  They only want you to order via kiosk  but it doesn t if customer is visually impaired and can t see screen.  After being told by staff  must wait to get help because there is no Coulter help.  45 minutes later  another customer had to assist.  Was at location for 1 hour  and 15 minutes to get a take out lunch.

Just left this location and I can t see myself coming back to this location any time soon.The wait was ridiculously long  costumer service was awful from the start.I made the mistake of not checking all of the items to make sure they were there and had to come back for a missing burrito.I tried calling the location multiple times to see if I could get the burrito through the dine in entrance since the drive through line was much longer now.Of course there was no answer and when I finally got to the speaker I was told my order can t be received at this moment even tho I had already paid for it.Finally someone with common sense understood the situation and was told to go ahead to the window.Once at the window a rude lady asked what Item  was supposedly missing  with an attitude.If you have to visit this location make sure to check all of your items are in the bag.
Took 25 min to get my order and I was practically the only customer there. Definitely need some better employees. Definitely steering clear of this place in the future.

This has got to be the absolute worst Taco Bell I have ever. My girlfriend and I stopped to grab some food about 1130 on July 4th  and  the got our entire 25 dolllar order wrong  and when we went back to have them fix it  the large Hispanic female wasn t going to open the door and assist us. When she finally got around to opening the door  to help us she wanted to argue and give us hard about fixing our order. When she final decided to fix the order  she only fixed half of it. When when we asked for the rest of the order she demanded our receipt  after she took the receipt and proceeded to walk around the store  till she decided it was time for her to leave. This lady who ever she is   wouldn t give her  doesn t need to be working in the service industry. She calmed to be a manager but with Piss poor customer service I highly doubt it..
They had no food    The customer service was also not great. Do not recommend going here for a late night snack

I deliver for door dash  this T bell location has always been like iffy a pain to pick up orders from for a variety of reasons  starting with at least 2 or 3 times so far they ve just not had the order  in the system   and won t let me place it myself without EXITING the long line and ENTERING AGAIN  yes for real   so I end up having waited in a usually stupid long drive thru line for no reason  unlike every other T Bell in Austin  this location won t help u or bring it out for you if u call  they just tell u that u have to get in the drive thru and wait...hi hello  it s easier for all of us if I m not adding to your drive thru line when I don t have to be  . All that is whatever  there s always gonna be BS to deal with doing any app gig work  but one thing that gets me is unnecessary rudeness. Tonight I went here to pick up an order for door dash  entered the drive thru as usual and let them know I was picking up door dash and the name on the order. Then tell me why at the window I got attitude from the staff handing me the food  she tells me  you can t just drive up into the drive thru  you have to let us know on the mic you re picking up door dash . I m confused  since I did do exactly that...so I tell her so and say  oh yeah I did that  I let whoever was on the mic know...  and then she SHUTS the window on me while I m still speaking and gives me some major stink eye. Just the rudeness is so defeating and bothersome  like girl we re both in the service industry just out here tryna make our money  the very very least we can do is not be a  holes to one another in the process. Is that too much to ask

Don t order the sweet tea at this location. I was craving Taco Bell sweet tea  so I chose this location for my lunch stop today instead of the other surrounding options. After I received my order and pulled away from the window  I tasted my drink and it was hands down the nastiest tea that I have ever tasted. It tasted like it had soured and been left out for several days. I only took two small sips and I felt physically ill.

I don t care what ya ll say about Taco Bell but you know damn well that they ve been there for you when you were broke  You were ballin on a budget when you ordered here  I always had their back  I think the ones who talk about having the runs are the ones who ve never been through the struggle... All in all Taco Bell continues to amaze with all the new things they keep coming up with. Their Cinnamon Delights Are Da Bomb    But weird that you can only choose between an order of 2 or 10. There s no in between.  lol. Just get the 10    Lol. Other than that. My go to from there are Cheesy Gordita Crunch with the Doritos Nacho Shell Instead  Tostadas  and their Nacho Bell Grande with lettuce on top. Feel free to give them a go

Fool me once..... so the saying goes. Did I learn from my previous visits   Noooo No more - Absolutely no more will I give this place my money  I ordered a steak flat bread and its chicken.  I ordered a steak Gordita - it has barely half a scoop of meat    I use to work for Taco Bell  I know the portions I should be getting.  To say this is to make more profit is an understatement   R I D I C U L O U S  I m done - stay away - even for a cheap place  you should be ashamed

Taco Bell I m confused as hell...  I pulled up to the window and was greeted very nicely but when I when I asked to order a quesarito they told me I could only order it on the app. I even clarified  so if I back up and place the order online I can order the item   She confirmed... I honestly don t understand the logic here  I wanted what I was craving so I backed up and ordered it online in the parking lot and came back thru saying I was here to pick up.  The biggest disappointment turned into how my chicken quesarito ended up being beef... This location needs to get it together

I will preface this by saying that we know it s a Taco Bell and what that gets you. However  I thought it would get me more than one ounce of nacho cheese in a two-ounce cup.   When we brought this to the manager s attention  along with the missing chips and taco -- all of which were flattened and stale   they said it was standard to serve the container half full.   They replaced the missing items but only a after they refused to give a refund as we no longer wanted the subpar food. We will be giving our patronage to Taco Cabana from now on.

I ordered cinnamon twist with my order. I didn t get them. I asked for hot sauce. Didn t get any. Not even 1 napkin to accompany my food. Now  I m home with an upset child because I promised her cinnamon twist. Thanks guys  Oh  and it was not even close to be being busy.

So I went to the store to redeem a coupon and for a supreme no crunchy taco I ended up getting a regular taco but I guess they re trying to trick me so they could save a few cents here and there they wrapped it up in a supreme taco wrapper put it in the bag and sent me on my way I don t appreciate the trickery involved of miss labeling the taco just to get me him through the window I ll talk to the mail store manager of which didn t resolve anything I ended up calling corporate office will see what they do I would take note for the lack of star positive star readings at most Taco Bell s get because there are definite lack of any professional customer service if that Taco BellIs the Toria s for it s over seasoned beef small portions and lack of customer service
Rude slow morons work the night shift here.  Don t order online  There s no point they just wait til you get there anyway.

They were out of nacho cheese.  No big deal I say.    Go ahead and just put shredded cheese on the 3 items.   They told me they would have to upcharge the difference for EVERY single item in my order.  Are you ____ing kidding me.  You want me to pay for Erica the manager s mistake.  It s not our fault you re out of cheese  Erica        The nerve.  This place is now the worst ever.  Ridiculous        I ll never go back  and with so many Taco Bells in the area...you shouldn t waste your time or money

Went to eat lunch at the E Anderson location and when we received our food we noticed our Mexican pizza had red hair on top of it. I went inside to let the manager know what was found on the pizza  only to find out it was the Manager s hair that was in our food. I asked to speak with the manager  Erica  and she yells out she would not be speaking with me as if my hair was found in her food    As she is wrapping her hair in a bun and putting a hair net over the bun . Jose who was working the window comes to the front and says very rudely he is the manager and no one had time to speak with me   after I was told ERICA WAS THE MANAGER   I then ask if I could have a number to someone over Erica and Jose  Jose gave me a number  the wrong number  to Ana. I then googled the main office and received a call back from ANA only to find out it was the wrong number

It s Taco Bell so you already know to adjust expectations. Is the food prepared reasonably well and served in the proper temperature  If so  they pass. Unfortunately  there have been numerous times when the food has not been heated up properly so loss of marks there. I will say however  that the professional behavior by the staff at this location is really warm and welcoming every-time I have gone inside this location. Truly a pleasant surprise

Went there for lunch last Wednesday  the three tacos I ordered had 1 4 of the toppings that they should have. The portions have gotten tiny.  I ve eaten there for years and never had a problem. I suppose a new manager is in charge and trying to increase profits.

This place is normally good. But lately the quality is getting lower. I ordered tacos and 3 Burritos and all my tacos are broken on the bottoms  and tasted like they been sitting out all day. They really need to work on there quality control. I m not happy about wasting 20

So I keep my expectations pretty low when it comes to any Taco Bell in America  mostly because its really hard to mess things up but for some reason the people here have no idea what they re doing. Taco Bell is one of those fast food chains that can make most things with beans instead of beef but somehow the people here always get my order wrong  which is tough because I am vegetarian. Every single order I get I always have to recheck  and then go back in or drive thru again so they can replace it. This is so stupid because I always get my order to go  why should I have to double it all the time    Someones being incredibly lazy here. The only reason I didn t give it one star is because they gave me free desserts one night for messing up my order.

This is the worst Taco Bell I have ever been to. Some of the female staff are ghetto and incompetent. The female manager acts like she can t control her employees. I will no longer be going to this specific location. And yet fast food people want  15 hr give me a break you don t deserve it if you have a nasty attitude. Oh and I recently went to this location and I recorded the customer service and a fat woman sitting on her behind was texting and asked me why am I recording her and that she was doing her job. First off  you have the right to record anyone in a public area read the laws and second she should have went elsewhere where she couldn t be seen if she wanted to sit on her behind and text on her phone. Nothing but unprofessional people that work here

I gave them one more star. Come on  the lady was trying hard and she doesn t have to take her job seriously  you know. They were also fast  although I did get there early. I tried The Nacho Fries Bell Grande. A taste double dare  I don t think so. I eat out too much. I ll probably end up going for another wack at it  as well as the smaller Nacho Fries. It was good  though. I just keep waiting for the burger places to come up with a hot dog burger or something.

You know that Taco Bell is hit or miss.   I rarely go to Taco Bell. I have been twice in 6 months and both times my order was missing an item. On 08 18 16 at 12 00PM the teller enters the order correctly  the line making the food not only forget an item again  the food was also poorly made. When you don t care than no care is taken when making the food. I will not be back to this location. I think the consensus is in. This location is not worth your time. Unless you don t care than this is the location for you
Showed up at 8pm and they said they were not taking orders. Staff was just hanging out in the drive through. Will never come back. Person in the drive through was rude and condescending.

Best tacobell around. Gave me a coupon for a free biscuit taco on Cinco de Mayo. They are kind of stingy with the fire sauce packets. You gotta ask for salsa and syrup for your waffle taco  see pic  . I AM A BREAKFAST DEFECTOR

Told me they had run out of beans at midnight.  Closes at 1am.  Just went by another Taco Bell and asked if this is even possible..   They told me unequivocally NO.  Beef yes  but they d have it restocked within the hour.  I thought I smelled something fishy with this.  Many years going to this location and you have to guess which end of the burrito has the sauce.  I got complacent..or lazy.  Went to Taco Bell a week ago in Cedar Park and that told me just how good this food should be.  Sauce end to end  fresh tasting etc.  I m not sure how you get so bad at making such basic food as the 183 Norwood Park location has gotten  or been  but it is dumbfounding.  DO NOT EAT at this location.
Drive thru order. Quick and easy. Cashier was on point. Wasn t constantly asking if I wanted anything else. In and out in 43 seconds.

First if they were out of nacho fries. Then the credit card machine declined my card twice  So then after being on hold for fifteen minutes with my bank  they tell me my card is fine. It s taco Bell machines. The tables were dirty. I had to ask for a straw  and napkins because they weren t stocked. I don t suggest going here.

I love Taco Bell  but this location frequently doesn t open on time  and if they even acknowledge your existence it s with an annoyed  we re not ready yet . It s about a 50 50 chance you can grab some breakfast in between 7 and 7 30am  they open at 7  supposedly . On top of that  they may be out of sauce at that time somehow. Pretty disorganized in the morning.

I just had an excellent experience at this location. It was clean and well stocked but the best part was the woman running the register. Her name is Donna and she greeted every customer brightly  made sure everyone got their orders and anything else they may need  and had a generally pleasant and welcoming demeanor. She alone would make me return to this particular store.

You have got to be kidding me   Wrong ordered like holy crap  My fianc  had to drive back to get it figured out  and still came home with the wrong food    It s not a hard job  Screw this location  we both work in the food industry  but if a manager can t get things right  then someone needs to get fired  It s fast food  Wtf   Is all I need to say  Corporate look into this location  We will not be back  It s Texas so many other options around especially for Mexican food              Not to mention your system sucks as well probably because all of your complaints at the moment  and don t think I won t say something to corporate they will hear from me

Your standard Taco Bell  although this one did not give me food poisoning. Bonus  This place is good for what it is - Taco Bell.   Their customer service is quick and efficient  at least at the drive-thru . No complaints

I seldom write reviews. Mostly because I m easily satisfied and my bar for customer service is pretty low. I ve given this particular taco bell multiple chances and every single time they have let me down. I m writing this review because of my visit today was probably the worst I ve had.    I walk into this chaos erupting between a worker there and her apparent grandchildren. She is losing a lung screaming at them and bounces back and forth between being inside and outside. I feel   well  this is okay  everyone has a crazy family  sure.  So I try to order and I m told to wait because they for some reason don t have a drawer open at 5 PM. I wait about ten minutes and suffer through more exchanges between grandma and her grandkids and the whole time there is another worker looking at me apologetically.  I m still on board  this is fine and I can wait.  Enter these two old ladies  they come in and sprawl around looking at the menu and don t even mind my existence  despite being first in line. They warm up to grandma worker and make small talk and give out their order and I look at the other worker and I look at grandma and it s decided that it s fine that customers are allowed to cut in line.   Look  I realize that Taco Bell isn t some last bastion of customer service and nor should it be  I believe they are aware of what they re peddling  a greasy scummy treat that you give yourself to scratch a certain unexplainable itch. I m absolutely done with this particular Taco Bell and I think I m done with the franchise as a whole.   TL DR  this taco bell sucks and don t bother. Travel the extra little bit and go to Arby s down the road for trashy fast food.

The guy who took our order was a total bro. I told him I d write a good review on yelp for his outstanding bro-ness  and goddammit thats what im going to do.  Allow me to paint you a picture.   Austin  Texas.  1 15 am.  Approximately 4.5 million degrees.   The sound of cicadas and unnervingly-close gunfire permeate the torrid night air.
